item.title: Is Tallow Balm Safe for Eczema? Natural Relief for Sensitive Skin
item.description: Is Tallow Balm Safe for Eczema? If you struggle with eczema, you’ve probably tried countless creams—many of which burn, dry out, or stop working after a while. Tallow balm NZ is different. It’s a natural, gentle, and deeply nourishing moisturiser that hydrates, soothes, and supports the skin barrier without irritating sensitive skin. 1. Free from Harsh Chemicals & Irritants ✔ No preservatives, synthetic fragrances, or alcohols → Common triggers for eczema flares.
